animeTitle: Yamanaka Sadao ni Sasageru Manga Eiga "Nezumikozou Jirokichi"
otherNames: Manga Cinema dedicated to Sadao Yamanaka "Nezumikozo Jirokichi"; 山中貞雄に捧げる漫画映画『鼠小僧次郎吉』
synopsis: The short movie will be a silent anime depicting behind-the-scene stories of the Nezumikozou Jirokichi: Edo no Maki (Nezumikozou Jirokichi: Chapter of Edo) film directed by Sadao Yamanaka, as well as his effort to produce it.
